creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: short vertical lines of connected (like cursive) characters--20 lines total; small red seal, URC; two small red seals, LLC
text:
As I spend my life wandering, I keep in my thoughts only the flowers of the four seasons:
For the traveler
No spirit of ill fortune—
clouds of blossoms
I enjoy learning from common things:
Creeping on the sand 
Even the bindweed 
Blossoms
Yesterday has passed and tomorrow is still uncertain:
Today, just for today
Blossoming happily—
The Rose of Sharon
Even at the end of the four season, I have something to believe and enjoy:
I only plead for
The treasure of the mountains—
Six-petal blossoms
title: Flowers of the Four Seasons
